name: Ashok Srinivasan
content: Ashok Srinivasan Skip to content Welcome! Welcome to my web site. I hope you find the material here informative. Please feel free to email me if you need additional information. With my friend Albert, at Madame Tussauds Ashok Srinivasan Fulbright Fellow PhD, University of California at Santa Barbara Research focus: High Performance Computing, with applications to computational science and public policy analysis My research has been funded by the above over the years Search for: Recent News Paper on training AI/ML models on missing data without imputation Paper on VIPRA Recommendation System HPC Wire article on mobility dataset for public health analysis Paper on VIPRA recommender system Data descriptor on crowds during the COVID-19 pandemic Archives Archives Select Month February 2025 November 2023 June 2023 April 2023 September 2021 August 2021 April 2021 September 2020 July 2020 June 2020 March 2020 November 2019 September 2019 July 2019 April 2019 August 2018 February 2018 October 2017 August 2017 January 2017 September 2016 August 2016 May 2016 February 2016 September 2015 Project VIPRA Science Based Policy Analysis Viral Infection Propagation Through Air-Travel
